mapper.select: SELECT usr.username AS usr_username, usr.documento AS usr_documento, usr.telefono AS usr_telefono, usr.email AS usr_email, usr.nombre AS usr_nombre, usr.edad AS usr_edad, usr.password AS usr_password, usr.direccion AS usr_direccion, usr.tipodocumento AS usr_tipodocumento, rol.id AS rol_id, rol.nombre AS rol_nombre, rol.descripcion AS rol_descripcion FROM usuarios AS usr JOIN rol ON usr.rol = rol.id WHERE usr.username = #{usernameOrEmail} OR usr.email = #{usernameOrEmail}
